title: Secprotcontend 2
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:galactic-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]
[[module CSS]]
.email-example .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link {
    animation: blink 0.8s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}
@keyframes blink {
    0% { color: transparent; }
    50%, 100% { color: #b01; }
}
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

[[div class="email-example"]]
[[=]]
------
[[collapsible show="View FedWeb? One (1) new message!" hide="Re:SUBJECT"]]
[[<]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** USER ZAAFE19839
**From:** USER JAAWQUE08062
**Subject:** Drop in THF elements
[[/div]]
------
Zaafe,

View the diagram I have attached. There has been an unnatural drop in THF elements[[footnote]]Translating measurement: "Anomalous Events"[[/footnote]] within Federation space. This is disconcerting. Shouldn't we be researching this?

[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** USER JAAWQUE08062
**From:** USER ZAAFE19839
**Subject:** Re:Drop in THF elements
[[/div]]
------
Jaawque,

Do not be alarmed. You should be focused on your radiation statistics, not THF statistics. It is your job.
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
**NOTE**
[[/=]]
The following document has been edited by user ZAAFE19839, a being of class-A intelligence. There is no need to re-edit.
[[/div]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 125%]]**Item #:** ACO-XXXX[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 125%]]###990000|**Location: U-1242, A-5, SC-7, Sys-18, P-3**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 125%]]**Object Class:** Meteor Belt[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 125%]]###990000|**Open Knowledge - No Importance**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
----

[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:100%;"]]
[[image sun.png style="width:100%;" link=#]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width:100%;"]]
Star of Sys-18
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

----

**Description:** ACO-XXXX is a meteor belt, barren of life, of no importance.
author: jaboi
